On Tue, Apr 02, 2002 at 10:25:25AM -0500, Dale E Martin wrote:
> I prefer to keep my tests in a separate hierarchy, and because of this
> I can't test methods with default access.

As has been pointed out before on this list, it is well possible to
keep tests in a separate source tree that mimics the structure of the
'real' soure tree. IMO that gets you the benefits of both approaches:
cleanly separated test source and access to package private methods.
